column4: Mobileye says it warned Tesla against enabling 'hands-free' driving
column5: FRANKFURT Mobileye NV said in a U.S. securities filing on Friday that its top executives were assured by Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk that drivers of the company's electric cars would not be allowed to take their hands off the wheel when using the "Autopilot" driving assistance system  but Tesla later allowed hands-free driving over Mobileye's objections. column4: Mobileye says it warned Tesla against enabling 'hands-free' driving
column5: FRANKFURT  Sept 16 Mobileye NV said in a U.S. securities filing on Friday that its top executives were assured by Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk that drivers of the company's electric cars would not be allowed to take their hands off the wheel when using the "Autopilot" driving assistance system  but Tesla later allowed hands-free driving over Mobileye's objections.
* Says expects third-quarter revenue to be $15.6 billion  plus or minus $300 million
